mapper.insert: insert into t_permission (module_code, module_name, perm_code, perm_name, description, available, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time, edition) values (#{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{edition,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_permission set module_code = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perm_code = #{permCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perm_name = #{permName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_by = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edition = #{edition,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, module_code, module_name, perm_code, perm_name, description, available, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time, edition from t_permission where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, module_code, module_name, perm_code, perm_name, description, available, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time, edition from t_permission

select t_perm.id, t_perm.module_code, t_perm.module_name, t_perm.perm_code, t_perm.perm_name, t_perm.description, t_perm.available, t_perm.create_by, t_perm.create_time, t_perm.modify_by, t_perm.modify_time, t_perm.edition from t_permission t_perm,t_role, t_role_permission t_role_permission WHERE t_role.role_name like #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t_role.id = t_role_permission.role_id AND t_perm.id = t_role_permission.permission_id

select t_perm.id, t_perm.module_code, t_perm.module_name, t_perm.perm_code, t_perm.perm_name, t_perm.description, t_perm.available, t_perm.create_by, t_perm.create_time, t_perm.modify_by, t_perm.modify_time, t_perm.edition from t_permission t_perm, t_user, t_role, t_user_role,t_role_permission WHERE t_user.login_name like #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t_user.id = t_user_role.user_id AND t_role.id = t_user_role.role_id AND t_role.id = t_role_permission.role_id AND t_perm.id = t_role_permission.permission_id
